title: Monstrous Devices: A Steampunk Collection
description: From NEW YORK TIMES bestselling author Melanie Karsak * A Limited Edition Steampunk CollectionDive into this collection of magical steampunk tales filled with wicked villains, renegade magicians, cunning monsters, and devious devices. Join Alice, Clemeny, Lily, Modeste, and others in this unique anthology of gaslamp fantasy, science fiction, and retold fairy tales.INCLUDED IN THIS BOX SET:Curiouser and Curiouser: Steampunk Alice in WonderlandWolves and Daggers: Steampunk Red Riding Hood (Best Steampunk Novel of 2018!)Princesses and Frogs: A Steampunk Frog Prince Short StoryChasing the Star Garden: The Airship Racing ChroniclesAlphas and Airships: Steampunk Red Riding HoodGolden Braids and Dragon Blades: Steampunk RapunzelDirty Deeds and Blood Knaves: A Steampunk Alice in Wonderland Short StoryBegin your adventure in Melanie Karsak's award-winning historical fantasy world!
author: Melanie Karsak
